import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' function FIlter({setSearch ,addamovie }) { const [show,setShow]=useState(false) const [newMovie,setNewMovie]=useState({ title:'', descripotion:'', posterURL:'', rating:1 }) const Close=()=>{ setShow(false) } const Open=()=>{ setShow(true) } const handleShow=()=>{ addamovie({...newMovie,id:Math.random()}) Close() } return (
Add a movie
Movie name setNewMovie({ ...newMovie, movieName: e.target.value }) } /> Movie description setNewMovie({ ...newMovie, description: e.target.value }) } /> Movie poster setNewMovie({ ...newMovie, imgUrl: e.target.value }) } /> Movie rating setNewMovie({ ...newMovie, rating: e.target.value }) } />
) } export default FIlter
